layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      RenderBlock (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 4x16
          text run at (0,0) width 4: " "
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,16) size 214x84 [border: (3px solid #0000BB)]

          RenderText {#text} at (9,0) size 196x32
            text run at (9,0) width 196: "Testing BORDERCOLOR tag"
            text run at (25,16) width 164: "the border shood be blue."
